tuv.seg: Ireland's InjuriesBoard.ie decides on personal injury claims where the person responsible for the injury is not disputing liability and consents to the Board assessing the claim for compensation

Déanann InjuriesBoard.ie na hÉireann cinneadh maidir le héilimh ar dhíobháil phearsanta sa chás nach bhfuil an duine a bhí freagrach as an ngortú ag cur i gcoinne dliteanais agus go dtoilíonn sé/sí don Bhord measúnú a dhéanamh ar an éileamh ar chúiteamh
Small claims and a court hearing
Éilimh bheaga agus éisteacht chúirte
If your small claims procedure case cannot be resolved it may be referred for a hearing in the District Court
Mura féidir do nós imeachta um éilimh bheaga a fhuascailt, d’fhéadfaí é a atreorú dá éisteacht sa Chúirt Dúiche
Taking a civil case
Cás Sibhialta a thógáil
An introduction to the issues and procedures involved in a civil case?
Tá cur síos anseo ar na bunchéimeanna a bhaineann le cás sibhialta
An outline of the concepts of negligence and compensation in civil cases is presented
Tá cur síos sa cháipéis seo ar fhaillí agus ar chúiteamh
When do you require legal representation and who represents you in court?
Tá cur síos anseo ar ghairm an dlí
Legal fees and costs for civil cases
Táillí dlí agus costais ar chásanna sibhialta
Explains what fees and costs means in a civil case
Tá cur síos sa cháipéis seo ar na costais a bhaineann le Cás Sibhialta
This document provides a general overview of writs and pleadings in civil cases
Tugann an doiciméad seo forbhreathnú ginearálta ar eascairí agus pleadálacha i gcásanna sibhialta
A claim notice is used to commence proceedings in the District Court
Úsáidtear fógra éilimh chun tús a chur le himeachtaí sa Chúirt Dúiche
Find out more about the forms that are used and the procedures that are followed
Aimsigh breis faisnéise faoi na foirmeacha a úsáidtear agus na nósanna imeachta a leantar
A Civil Bill is a document that you must serve on the defendant in order to commence proceedings in the Circuit Court
Cuireann an doiciméad seo síos ar an 'mBille Sibhialta', dociméad nár mhór duit a sheirbheáil ar an gCosantóir chun imeachtaí a thosú sa Chúirt Chuarda
An originating summons is a summons that usually commences civil proceedings in the High Courti
Toghairm a chuireann tús le himeachtaí sibhialta san Ard Chúirt is ea an toghairm thionscnaimh
This document describes how claims are settled in civil cases
Tá cur síos sa cháipéis seo ar chás a réiteach
Civil court cases follow a standard format
Imeachtaí i gcásanna cúirte sibhialta
Information on proceedings, how witnesses are called and liability
Tá cur síos sa cháipéis seo ar éisteacht cúirte i gcás sibhialta
Appealing the Decision in a Civil Case
Achomharc ar an gCinneadh
Find out how to appeal a decision in a civil court case in Ireland
Tá cur síos sa cháipéis seo ar cén chaoi achomharc a dhéanamh i gcás sibhialta
Functions, responsibilities and duties of Commissioners for Oaths are described and an explanation of the services they provide in Ireland is provided
Cur síos ar na feidhmheanna agus dualgais atá ar Choimisinéirí Mionn
Peace Commissioners in Ireland have legal functions and are honorary appointments
Pléann an cháipéis seo na dualgais atá ar Choimisinéirí Síochána
A notary public serves the public in non-contentious matters usually concerned with foreign or international business
Déanann nótaire poiblí freastal ar an bpobal in ábhair neamhchonspóideacha a bhaineann de ghnáth le gnó iasachta nó idirnáisiúnta
